name: buddha
description: 부스트 DDㅏ방, 부따 Buddha ᕕ( ᐛ )ᕗ

scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run test:cov -w server" "npm run test -w client"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start:dev -w server" "npm run start -w client"
scripts.build: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run build -w server" "npm run build -w client"
